Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Pan Pacific Singapore in Singapore (Marina Bay), you'll be minutes from Marina Square and Esplanade Theatres. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Haji Lane and Chinatown Heritage Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 790 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, a steam room, and a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and shopping on site. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Singapore? This hotel has 31969 square feet (2970 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle and a train station pick-up service are provided for an additional charge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, supervised childcare/activities, and shopping on site. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at Pan Pacific Singapore in Singapore (Marina Bay), you'll be minutes from Marina Square and Esplanade Theatres. This 4.5-star hotel is close to Haji Lane and Chinatown Heritage Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Marina Square - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Parco Marina Bay - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Millenia Walk - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Esplanade Mall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
CityLink Mall - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Suntec City - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Suntec Singapore - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Esplanade Theatres - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Esplanade Park - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Singapore Flyer - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Civilian War Memorial - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
ArtScience Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Saint Andrew's Cathedral - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Raffles City - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Bras Basah Complex - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Pan Pacific Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 16.1 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room 1

Notice
Dress Code: Smart Elegant during cocktails hours from 1800 to 2000hrs Short Sportswear/short shoes, flip flops, slippers and sandals (sling back shoes for ladies are acceptable) are not permitted from 1800 to 2000hrs Guest of 12 years and above are welcome at pacific Club.


-Check-in time is after 1500hrs on the day of arrival. For FIT/s requiring access to the room/s prior to 1500hrs, the room/s must be reserved from the previous night at the applicable full contract rate, unless prior arrangement/s has made in writing with the Hotel. -Check-out time is 1200hrs on the day of departure. Late check-out up to 18hrs is at the applicable day use rates and check-out after 1800hrs is at the full day charge, subject to room availability unless prior arrangement/s has been made in writing with the hotel.


Honeymoon: Honeymooners must not stay longer than 2 months

RoomType.text: Deluxe Room with Balcony + Free Wifi

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Rate not applicable to Singapore Citizens & permanent residents Club Privileges only include for Pacific Room & Pacific Harbour Suite -Champagne breakfast at pacific club level 38 or buffet breakfast at Edge level 3 from 6am-11am. -Sunset cocktails & canapes from 6pm-8pm -Round the clock club service (for guest 12 year & above) -Use of pacific club private dining rooms with prior reservation -50% discount on the secretarial services at Pacific Centre -Prices are subject to service charge and prevailing government taxes Road Closure on 10, 23 and 24 FEB due to Chingay Parade To reach our hotel: our front driveway is OPEN via ECP or Bras Basah Road or Nicoll Highway The hotel will be refurbishing the Level 4 outdoor garden Pavilion next to Keyaki from 2 January 2018 Keyaki restaurant is not affected by the refurbishment and will remain open for business throughout the renovation Swimming pool will be closed from Sunday, 11 March 2018 to Friday, 16 March 2018 to facilitate these works
